name: Get E'm Keys
description:
A short platformer developed for a programming class. 

Move sideways with A and D, jump with spacebar. Right click on the mouse for teleportation. Collect 5 keys and spawn a door to win!

Created by Tiago Sambatti Viana
GAM 655 - Midterm Project

Artwork by S4M_UR4I
Main theme by 5c1Rokker
